alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:26AM CDT until June 15 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARRISON...SOUTHEASTERN BURT AND NORTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 426 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Tekamah, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Mondamin around 430 AM CDT. Little Sioux around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pisgah. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
